Having a file/module with one public class and other inner or local classes it 
is only possible to have one Category.
perhaps because of the ClassLoader is per module/file.

Hence in case the "location" is a class name..logging from a local class does 
not work.

Instead "Public class" module name must be used...

This precludes using the getClass().getName() ....
